label: Letter from Mrs. F. Perry Metz and Christine O. Jackson to Richard Allen Ford, October 31, 1966
description: Correspondence from Mrs. F. Perry Metz, Chairman of Membership Committee of the Coming Street Y.W.C.A., to Christine O. Jackson, Branch Director, to Richard Allen Ford, Music Director for Burke High School, regarding Y.W.C.A. Branch Membership Committee matters.
